title: this is the first
content:
Build the Content Submission system for Epistora.

Create /post/create/index.php.

Logic: When a post is submitted, generate a post_id as [UniqueString][Year][Month][WriterID].

Permissions: If the user is a v_writer or admin, set status to 'published'. Immediately add the metadata (title, preview, author) to /data/posts.json and create the full content file in /data/post_content/[post_id].json.

If the user is a standard writer, set status to 'pending' and only create the file in /data/post_content/.

Create /admin/pending/index.php for admins to review and move 'pending' metadata into the global posts.json index.
author: Md. Asraful Islam
